attributes.action: Fuel prices must come down, It is becoming an unaffordable necessity.
attributes.additional_details: People who drive to work at short or long distances are affected by this. Fuel is a necessity for all vehicle drivers and the price is too high for the consumers to afford on daily basis. Action must be taken.
attributes.background: Put fuel prices down dramatically in the whole of UK and Northen Ireland.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for.

Decisions about fuel prices are a matter for individual fuel companies, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Reduce fuel duty and VAT by 40% for a period of 2 years:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089
